name: Erin Hudson
tagline: Cytogenetic Technologist ready to make the leap into web development
body:
_Self motivated, passionate, creative professional looking to transfer skills and make a career change into the world of web development_

#Professional Experience
**Lead Cytogenetic Technologist** Knight Diagnostic Laboratories, OHSU | Portland OR | May 2015 - present
 * Develop all aspects of leadership including training, leading meetings, monitor workflow, and provide direction to technologists and solutions to issues
 * Update laboratory documentation, troubleshoot lab equipment, and process improve procedures


**Cytogenetic Technologist** Knight Diagnostic Laboratories, OHSU | Portland, OR | Sept. 2011 - May 2015
 * Perform clinical lab testing procedures for FISH (fluorescent in situ hybridization) and aCGH microarray to test for cancer and congenital disorders. Clinical workflow includes processing, analysis, image resulting, and reporting 
 * Work with software to scan, upload, convert, and analyze laboratory data
 * Work in a team and communicate with healthcare providers to achieve timely, accurate results

 
**Clinical Lab Technologist** Access Genetics | Eden Prairie, MN | Oct. 2010 - Sept 2011
 * Process clinical specimens for molecular detection of markers for cancer in the urinary tract utilizing FISH
 * Analyze and review specimen results, assist with lab quality analysis / quality control programs


**Cytogenetic Technologist** Mayo Clinic FISH lab | Rochester, MN | May 2009 - Oct. 2010
 * Perform FISH microscopic analysis to detect chromosome abnormalities associated with cancer and congenital disorders
 * Work closely with coworkers to ensure timely, accurate laboratory results


##Education
**Mayo Clinic Cytogenetic Technology Program**
 * Completed coursework to fulfill program requirements (August 2008 to April 2009)
Obtained hands on laboratory experience in culture and harvest, conventional analysis (congenital an hematologic), and fluorescent in situ hybridization

**St. Mary's University of Minnesota**
 * Bachelor of Science 2008, Biology: Cytogenetic Technology Major 


##Hobbies & Interests
 * Food & travel blogging, creating and working with wordpress blog
 * Photography, creating and working with personal portfolio box website
 * Social media engagement, including instagram, tmblr, and pinterest
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
